sources.title: Mysteria
sources.description: A once-famous, now-washed-up Hollywood screenwriter, is fighting to finish his latest script with an unrealistic deadline. He finds himself in the center of a murder investigation involving a prominent politician's wife. The surrounding events feed him inspiration for his script.

sources.title: Mysteria | FULL MOVIE | Thriller | Billy Zane, Michael Rooker, Danny Glover
sources.description:
Fighting to finish his script for a producer (Billy Zane), Aleister (Robert Miano) finds the inspiration amidst a murder investigation lead by Captain McCarthy (Michael Rooker) and his investigator (Danny Glover).

Danny Glover, Billy Zane, Michael Rooker, Martin Landau, Robert Miano, Meadow Williams, Cassandra Gava, Peter Mark Richman

Directed by Lucius C. Kuert
2011
